snippet: Authorities say a suburban New Orleans woman has been found bludgeoned to death in her bathtub and the man she lived with and his three children are missing....

headline.print_headline: Police: Woman Dead; Companion, 3 Children Missing
headline.main: Police: Woman Dead; Companion, 3 Children Missing

lead_paragraph: Authorities say a suburban New Orleans woman has been found bludgeoned to death in her bathtub and the man she lived with and his three children are missing.
